channel.title: Bo Willems | Value-Based Imaging Research Group

item.title: Bo Willems
item.description: The PINPOINT study aims to improve outcomes of patients with lung cancer by diagnosing as early as possible. Within our group, I will focus my research on the implementation of AI, determining the cost-effectiveness of AI tools and showing the carbon footprint when using these innovative solutions.Â Next to my work at AstraZeneca, where I am responsible for our thoracic oncology portfolio, I aim to improve lives of lung cancer patients with this PhD
